headers.value: Content-Type, Origin, Accept, Authorization, Content-Length, X-Requested-With

responses.body:
{
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "last_updated": "2024-11-28",
  "content": "## Juniper Digital Assistant Terms of Use

This Terms of Use defines the requirements that all users of any
AI-enabled Juniper Digital Assistant must adhere to in good faith. By
using a Juniper Digital Assistant provided by Juniper Networks, Inc.
("**Juniper**"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do
not agree to these terms, please do not use the Juniper Digital
Assistant. Juniper Digital Assistants may include, but are not limited
to, those chatbots related to or found on Mist, JCloud, JTAC, the
Juniper website, etc.

\(a\) The Juniper Digital Assistant may include or utilize third-party
features that use machine learning and other artificial intelligence
technologies (including large language models) ("**AI Technology**").
Juniper may utilize any data submitted by you through the Juniper
Digital Assistant to provide the AI Technology to you and to improve its
products and services. You acknowledge that AI Technology may include
experimental features which could produce inaccurate or incomplete
results. AI Technology is not designed for or intended to meet your
regulatory, legal, or other obligations. All results and outputs of AI
Technology are provided AS IS, and Juniper disclaims all liability
arising from your use of the Juniper Digital Assistant.

\(b\) You shall (1) be responsible for assessing whether outputs or
results produced by AI Technology are suitable, including by human
oversight and human intervention, (2) use AI Technology and its outputs
in accordance with applicable laws, and (3) obtain any and all
third-party consents necessary for the use and processing of data in
connection with the AI Technology.

\(c\) You shall not circumvent or bypass any safety and security
features of the AI Technology, including, but not limited to, those
intended to limit the functionality of the AI Technology to its intended
use case, and to minimize infringement and harmful or biased results.

\(d\) Juniper reserves the right to modify, limit, suspend or terminate
access to AI Technology immediately and without notice if you are in
violation of this Terms of Use, or if it becomes necessary to do so as a
result of a change in law or action of a legal authority that results in
Juniper's inability to continue to offer the AI Technology in its then
current form, including the loss of ability to use any third-party
provider of AI Technology.
",
  "action": "accept",
  "action_version": "1.0.0",
  "accept_required": false
}
